verbs.description: WEST PALM BEACH , Fla. -- [ARG1: An Ohio man] [R-ARG1: who] [V: flew] [ARGM-DIR: to Palm Beach County] [ARGM-PRP: in order to smoke a joint with President Trump at Mar - a - Lago] ended up under arrest instead , according to a sheriff 's office report .

WEST PALM BEACH , Fla. -- An Ohio man [ARG0: who] flew to Palm Beach County in order to [V: smoke] [ARG1: a joint] [ARGM-COM: with President Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at Mar - a - Lago] ended up under arrest instead , according to a sheriff 's office report .

WEST PALM BEACH , Fla. -- [ARG1: An Ohio man who flew to Palm Beach County in order to smoke a joint with President Trump at Mar - a - Lago] [V: ended] up [ARG2: under arrest] [ARGM-DIS: instead] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a sheriff 's office report] .

WEST PALM BEACH , Fla. -- An Ohio man who flew to Palm Beach County in order to smoke a joint with President Trump at Mar - a - Lago ended up under arrest instead , [V: according] to a sheriff 's office report .
